OUTLINE : This randomize , multicenter study . Patients stratify accord tumor location ( pineal v suprasellar v pineal + suprasellar ) , disease stage ( disseminate vs occult multi-focal v localize ) . Patients randomize 1 2 treatment regimen . All patient undergo operative procedure ( endoscopic biopsy , stereotactic biopsy , open craniotomy ) confirm diagnosis pure germ cell germinoma follow intraoperative perioperative staging evaluation . - Regimen A ( radiotherapy ) : Within 52 day surgery , patient undergo standard-dose radiotherapy daily day 1-5 approximately 5-6 week . - Regimen B ( chemotherapy plus radiotherapy ) : - Courses 1 2 : Patients receive carboplatin IV 1 hour day 1 2 etoposide IV 2 hour day 1-3 . Treatment repeat every 21 day 2 course . Patients achieve complete response ( CR ) proceed reduced-dose radiotherapy . Patients minimal residual disease ( MRD ) , partial response ( PR ) , stable disease ( SD ) receive chemotherapy course 3 4 outline . Patients progressive disease undergo second surgical procedure biopsy restaged . Patients confirm diagnosis germ cell tumor change tumor marker new lesion restaging proceed chemotherapy course 3 4 . - Courses 3 4 : Patients receive cisplatin IV 6 hour day 1 , cyclophosphamide IV 1 hour day 2 3 , filgrastim ( G-CSF ) subcutaneously IV begin day 4 continue blood count recover . Treatment repeat every 21 day 2 course . Patients achieve CR MRD proceed reduced-dose radiotherapy . Patients PR , SD , progressive disease restaged . Patients confirm diagnosis germ cell tumor restaging undergo standard radiotherapy regimen A . - Reduced-dose radiotherapy : Within 6 week start course 4 , patient undergo lower-dose radiotherapy daily day 1-5 5 week . Treatment regimens continue absence unacceptable toxicity event non-germinomatous germ cell tumor detect . Quality life neuropsychological function within domain intelligence , attention-concentration , memory , executive functioning assess 9 , 30 , 60 month diagnosis . Patients follow every 4 month 2 year , annually thereafter . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 225 patient ( approximately 112 per treatment regimen ) accrue study within 5 year .
